languages.text: "Злоба Вульфена взыграла в моем сердце. И чуть не покорила его навечно".
"The malice of Wulfen beset my heart. And nearly consumed it forevermore."
languages.original_text: "Злоба Вульфена взыграла в моем сердце. И чуть не покорила его навечно".

traits.locale_text: "Wulfen's malice beset my heart. And it nearly conquered it whole."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Wulfen's malice beset my heart. And it nearly conquered it whole."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The malice of Wulfen beset my heart. And nearly consumed it forevermore."

traits.locale_text: "The malice of Wulfen beset my heart. And nearly consumed it forevermore."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « La malveillance du Wulfen s'est insinuée dans mon cœur. Elle l'a presque entièrement consumée. »
languages.original_text: "The malice of Wulfen beset my heart. And nearly consumed it forevermore."

traits.locale_text: « La malveillance du Wulfen s'est insinuée dans mon cœur. Elle l'a presque entièrement consumée. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “狼人恶毒的诅咒侵蚀着我的心，几乎让我彻底失去了理智。”
languages.original_text: "The malice of Wulfen beset my heart. And nearly consumed it forevermore."

traits.locale_text: “狼人恶毒的诅咒侵蚀着我的心，几乎让我彻底失去了理智。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「ウルフェンの悪意が俺の心を襲った。そして危うく、永遠に飲み込まれるところだった」
languages.original_text: "The malice of Wulfen beset my heart. And nearly consumed it forevermore."

traits.locale_text: 「ウルフェンの悪意が俺の心を襲った。そして危うく、永遠に飲み込まれるところだった」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Mein Herz war von Wulfens Bosheit erfüllt. Und fast hätte sie es für alle Zeit verzehrt."
languages.original_text: "The malice of Wulfen beset my heart. And nearly consumed it forevermore."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Herz war ergriffen von Wulfens Bosheit. Sie schaffte es fast, es vollständig zu erobern."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «La maldad de Wulfen ha llenado mi corazón y ha estado a punto de consumirlo para siempre».
languages.original_text: "The malice of Wulfen beset my heart. And nearly consumed it forevermore."

traits.locale_text: «La maldad de Wulfen ha llenado mi corazón y ha estado a punto de consumirlo para siempre».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Börü garazı, kalbimi ele geçirdi. Az kalsın ebediyen yakıp kül edecekti."
languages.original_text: "The malice of Wulfen beset my heart. And nearly consumed it forevermore."

traits.locale_text: "Börü garezi, kalbimi ele geçirdi. Az kalsın ebediyen yakıp kül edecekti."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
